mapper.sql: a.id AS 'id', a.create_id AS 'createId', a.create_date AS 'createDate', a.update_id AS 'updateId', a.update_date AS 'updateDate', a.remark AS 'remark', a.del_flag AS 'delFlag', a.province_id AS 'provinceId', a.city_id AS 'cityId', a.area_id AS 'areaId', a.address AS 'address', a.owner AS 'owner', a.phone AS 'phone', a.total_floors AS 'total_floors', a.num AS 'num', a.init_status AS 'initStatus'
